channel.title: [PI] [DESPERATE] Godwars animations/objects
channel.description:
No where else has given me a hand, so lets try here.
Hey guys,
[I]All the information is at the top, nothing below the list.[/I]
I've looked hard before posting this... and tried some of the stuff i found on forums; didn't work. This included... Attempting to add them myself... then; http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,463378.0.html <---- Probably wrong and noobish..? and i've also asked some friends for help. None off which had a solution.
I'm using a DSPK base (originally NICKname's base), trying to fix the godwars in it. (I think it uses a 474 cache with 602 animations but i could be wrong)
I would pay for help but considering as i have no money to do so with im very desperate for someone to help
even if you just point out whats wrong along with a possible fix...
The only reward i can offer is REP++ to the person or people who help me to fix.. :)
Someone mentioned that the bosses will probably require new animation files? Also mentioned that the sara maps was to do with the flo.dat in my cache?
Please, please, i beg of you, HELP im really lost on this lol! :(
Currently, the issues are as follows;
[B]Major:[/B] - Zamorak bosses, all animations are buggy (the don't appear when their standing still or attacking in some cases, sometimes they flicker when moving but other than that nothing) however they appear on the minimap (yellow dots) [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/nwewr4.jpg[/img]
- Saradomin room has a black floor + (dirty brown) water :( [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2i73cpw.jpg[/img]
- Saradomin room has black waterfall [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/27yo13t.jpg[/img]
[B]Minor[/B] - Zamorak (some) walls are missing near boss room door. [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/3006seq.jpg[/img]
- A Mushroom (house?) appears outside Bandos, Armadyl and sometimes Zamorak boss doors [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/xd9nhc.jpg[/img]
- One corner wall missing in saradomin wall (next to boss room, which tbh isn't a big issue) [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/4jqc8m.jpg[/img]
- Knight of saradomin has a red triangle when looking from one angle. [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/15f6lg3.jpg[/img]

item.title: [PI] [DESPERATE] Godwars animations/objects
item.dc:creator: @Zeroize Zeroize
item.description:
@Zeroize wrote:

No where else has given me a hand, so lets try here.

Hey guys,

All the information is at the top, nothing below the list.

I’ve looked hard before posting this… and tried some of the stuff i found on forums; didn’t work.
This included…
Attempting to add them myself…
then; http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,463378.0.html <---- Probably wrong and noobish…?
and i’ve also asked some friends for help. None off which had a solution.

I’m using a DSPK base (originally NICKname’s base), trying to fix the godwars in it. (I think it uses a 474 cache with 602 animations but i could be wrong)

I would pay for help but considering as i have no money to do so with im very desperate for someone to help

even if you just point out whats wrong along with a possible fix…

The only reward i can offer is REP++ to the person or people who help me to fix…

Someone mentioned that the bosses will probably require new animation files?
Also mentioned that the sara maps was to do with the flo.dat in my cache?

Please, please, i beg of you, HELP im really lost on this lol!

Currently, the issues are as follows;

Major:

  • Zamorak bosses, all animations are buggy (the don’t appear when their standing still or attacking in some cases, sometimes they flicker when moving but other than that nothing) however they appear on the minimap (yellow dots)

  • Saradomin room has a black floor + (dirty brown) water

  • Saradomin room has black waterfall

Minor

  • Zamorak (some) walls are missing near boss room door.

  • A Mushroom (house?) appears outside Bandos, Armadyl and sometimes Zamorak boss doors

  • One corner wall missing in saradomin wall (next to boss room, which tbh isn’t a big issue)

  • Knight of saradomin has a red triangle when looking from one angle.
